birthdays_package package¶

Submodules¶

birthdays_package.birthdays_module module¶

This is our birthday module.

birthdays_package.birthdays_module.return_data(filename='birthdays_package/birthdays.csv')¶

Open the birthdays.csv and return name, date of birth, date of death (if exists) and city.

Parameters

filename – (str) The path the file that contains the data

Returns

data about the chosen person (name, birth, death, city)

birthdays_package.birthdays_module.return_index(name)¶

Open the birthdays.csv and return name, date of birth, date of death (if exists) and city.

Parameters

filename – (str) The path the file that contains the data

Returns

data about the chosen person (name, birth, death, city)

birthdays_package.birthdays_module.return_set(name)¶

Return the name of the persons born in the same century of the one that the user is trying to search for.

Parameters

name – (str) the name of the person to base the search on

Return dt_same

(dict) dictionary containing people born in the same ct.
